revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

__TOC__
== Notes == 
'''Taverns''' contain various NPCs: Waiter, Barkeeper, Tavern keeper, Cook, and Brewer. 

Like the [[Inn]], if you haven't been in combat for a couple of minutes, you may log out instantly from the game world from within a Tavern.
== Locations ==
[[Britain]](x4), [[Buccaneer's Den]], [[Jhelom]], [[Minoc]], [[Nujel'm]](x2), [[Serpent's Hold]](x2), [[Trinsic]], [[Vesper]]
